value.verse: Jesus, as a mother you gather your people to you; *
value.halfverse: you are gentle with us as a mother with her children.
tenderly you draw us from hatred and judgment.
value.verse: Often you weep over our sins and our pride, *
You comfort us in sorrow and bind up our wounds, *
value.halfverse: in sickness you nurse us and with pure milk you feed us.
by your anguish and labor we come forth in joy.
value.verse: Jesus, by your dying, we are born to new life; *

value.halfverse: through your gentleness, we find comfort in fear.
value.verse: Despair turns to hope through your sweet goodness; *
Your warmth gives life to the dead, *

value.halfverse: in your love and tenderness, remake us.
value.verse: Lord Jesus, in your mercy, heal us; *
In your compassion, bring grace and forgiveness, *
value.halfverse: for the beauty of heaven, may your love prepare us.
